title: Ransomed MC Princess #2
description: The man I grew up with might have stolen my heart, but someone else would claim me. To save everyone I love, I will have to make the ultimate choice...and the ultimate sacrifice.  This is the story of the beginning of our love, and the end of it. It's the story of how and why I was taken. It's the story of the night that changed my destiny.
author: Vivian Cove
